section.heading: Operating under the influence of alcohol or a drug; watercraft.
section.text: No person shall operate or be in physical control of any watercraft in the District:

para.text: While the person is intoxicated; or
While the person is under the influence of alcohol or any drug or any combination thereof.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-266 added this section.

For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 103(e)(3) of the Comprehensive Impaired Driving and Alcohol Testing Program Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-3, January 29, 2013, 60 DCR 2762, 20 DCSTAT 410).
